summary: AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION PROBLEMS.  THIS IS THE SECOND TIME THE TRANSMISSION HAS GONE OUT.  FIRST TRANSMISSION WAS REPLACED BY MAZDA IN 2001.  SECOND, WHEN CAR WAS PLACED IN "PARK" IT BECAME STUCK.  IT COULD NOT BE UNLOCKED FROM PARK, COULD NOT BE PUSHED OUT OF THE WAY, AND THE CAR HAD TO BE TOWED.  THE MECHANIC SAYS IT IS A COMPUTER CHIP IN THE CONSOLE THAT IS CAUSING THE PROBLEM.  *JB
